## goal node clone

Clone the specified node to create another node

### Synopsis

Clone the specified node to create another node

```
goal node clone [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help               help for clone
  -n, --noledger           Don't include ledger when copying (No Ledger)
  -t, --targetdir string   Target directory for the clone
```
